title: How to Make Maple Walnuts

steps.headline: Make the frosting filling:
steps.description: Beat the white of one egg to a stiff froth. Stir in enough powdered sugar to make it like hard frosting.

steps.headline: Make the syrup.
steps.description: Boil the maple sugar in a cup of water until a syrup forms.

steps.headline: Dip the walnut meats in the syrup.
Spoon up small amounts of the filling and spread between two halves of a walnut and press down hard to join the two walnuts.
Set aside to let the filling harden.
Serve.
steps.description: Once set, the walnuts are ready for serving or for packaging as a great foodie gift.

text: Make the frosting filling: Beat the white of one egg to a stiff froth. Stir in enough powdered sugar to make it like hard frosting. Make the syrup. Boil the maple sugar in a cup of water until a syrup forms. Dip the walnut meats in the syrup.  Spoon up small amounts of the filling and spread between two halves of a walnut and press down hard to join the two walnuts.  Set aside to let the filling harden.  Serve. Once set, the walnuts are ready for serving or for packaging as a great foodie gift. Finished.
